decisions.rationale: Proceed with governed bundle artifacts using link-only intake for agentic platform updates.
Keep report and metrics stable; timestamps reserved for stamp.json.

findings.summary: GitHub Copilot SDK exposes an agentic execution loop that can be embedded into applications for native agent workflows.
Claude models are integrated into ServiceNow agent tooling, signaling enterprise-grade, no-code workflow automation.
MCP extensions expand into interactive app workflows (Slack, Figma, Canva), turning chat into an action control plane.
Agentic autonomy raises prompt-injection and tool-abuse risks, requiring hardened security controls and auditability.
